statements: SELECT * FROM payment_reports;
SELECT report_date, total_amount FROM payment_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, payment_method FROM payment_reports WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM payment_reports WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS num_reports FROM payment_reports GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY num_reports DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_reports WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, total_amount, payment_method FROM payment_reports WHERE customer_id = 'e967aba9-4a30-4db5-a1d7-57cf0c4e42a3';
SELECT report_id, report_date, total_amount, payment_method FROM payment_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-05-31' ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS report_count FROM payment_reports GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT report_id, customer_id, total_amount, payment_method FROM payment_reports WHERE payment_method LIKE '%credit%' ORDER BY customer_id ASC, total_amount DESC;
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date, customer_id FROM payments WHERE payment_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT payment_id, amount FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM payments GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM finances WHERE revenue > expenditure;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE customer_id = 1 ORDER BY payment_date DESC
SELECT payment_id, amount FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount_paid FROM payments GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT * FROM finances WHERE revenue > expenditure
SELECT financial_id, report_date FROM finances WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY report_date ASC
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT business_name, industry FROM businesses WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email_address LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT business_name, industry, location FROM businesses ORDER BY business_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, payment_date FROM payment_transactions WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 500;
SELECT report_id, report_name, report_date FROM reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY payment_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT p.product_name, p.price, c.customer_name FROM products p JOIN customers c ON p.product_id = c.customer_id WHERE p.category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY p.price DESC;
SELECT r.report_name, r.report_date, c.customer_name FROM reports r INNER JOIN customers c ON r.customer_id = c.customer_id ORDER BY r.report_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3, 4, 5) ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number = '123-456-7890';
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50 ORDER BY unit_price ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, total_amount FROM transactions WHERE quantity >= 5;
SELECT report_type, generated_date FROM reports ORDER BY generated_date DESC;
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM payments;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT product_id, product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50 ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, payment_id, product_id, quantity, total_amount FROM transactions WHERE total_amount BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000;
SELECT report_id, report_type, generated_date, report_data FROM reports WHERE generated_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY generated_date DESC;
